error.message: Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Call to deprecated method strlen() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strlen() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to lang.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
